items.title: Zuma's daughter to appear in court over South Africa riots, reports say
items.description: Duduzile Zuma-Sambudla is accused of inciting violence in 2021 following the jailing of her father.

items.title: In pictures: Welcoming the Lunar New Year
items.description: Fireworks, music, lanterns, and dragon dancing filled streets across Asia to celebrate the Year of the Snake.

items.title: Ukrainian drone strike hits second Russian oil refinery in a week
items.description: The wave of drone strikes is Ukraine's second large-scale attack on Russia this week.

items.description: Where are rebels causing havoc in eastern DR Congo getting their funding?

items.title: 'It's absolute chaos': At the scene of Kumbh Mela crush
items.description: Vikas Pandey and Samira Hussain explain how the chaos unfolded in northern India.
